title: The Dead of Night
description: A mother of two goes missing in Monrovia, California. As detectives investigate, the woman's friends and family reveal that she feared she was being stalked. Josh Mankiewicz reports. Originally aired on NBC on October 9, 2020.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
